TopicTitle: I managed to get INSIDE the mun

Articles.Content:
I was using mechjeb, trying to get in the same orbit as the mun when mechjeb ran into the mun. instead of crashing though, this happened:

Then, when i reached the core of the mun i reached incredible speed.

After that, everything broke...
Did you have time warp on? That\'s the only time it\'s happened to me. I assume it\'s a known issue.
What is the detail level set to? I know there\'s a bug with the detail settings that could cause this...
If your detail is too low you burn straight through the Mun. Thank goodness I am getting a Nvidia Geforce 550 GTX tomorrow.
I have a ATI Radeon HD 5800 Series and all settings set to maximum.

If your detail is too low you burn straight through the Mun. Thank goodness I am getting a Nvidia Geforce 550 GTX tomorrow.

I literally just bought a GTX 550 Ti SC yesterday.

Works great, very nice card, reasonable price.

Would you mind sharing your mods and your ship

thanks would be great
The mods appear to be ZO2 and MechJeb.
